sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable react-hooks/rules-of-hooks */ import { useContext } from "react"; import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { getData, deleteCart } from "../../Context/CartContext"; const cart = () => { const cart = getData(); return (

Carrito de compras

{cart.length > 0 ? ( cart.map(sale =>

{sale.vendedor.name}

Contenido {sale.amount} Articulos
Valor del pedido {sale.price}
Gastos de envio {sale.shipmentbill}
Total {(sale.price*sale.amount) + sale.shipmentbill}
) ) : (
No hay productos en el carrito
)}

Total: {cart.reduce((total, cart) => total + cart.price * cart.quantity, 0)}

); }; export default cart;
